Text: smith PST Whats up then You gathered Bruce never made the connection Fridays abort was due to a plane crash in Birmingham backing everything up at Aberdeen and everywhere else Delivered him Saturday night he overnighted in Aberdeen checked in for his yday am and by it still hadnt left so he would have missed yet another connection in Amsterdam That was actually OK as I spoke to the guy in Jordan who said Amman was snowed in The good bit is hes got his appointment with the specialist on Wednesday afternoon to discuss the knee Ive also booked him in with the surgery to discuss depression etc Tomorrow we are down and up from Glasgow to renew a passport which is too full to get a new Saudi visa what a start to the year Anyway lets have your news thought you were having a meeting today lots of love s Bruce GilbertSmith
